scrubber noun [C]
(CLEAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an object for scrubbing things to clean them: a pan scrubber
a system or piece of equipment for removing substances that are harmful to the environment from a gas: Scrubbers in factory chimneys can extract harmful particles before they are vented into the atmosphere.
